documents.text:
--- Visit 1 | Date: 2025-06-14 ---

Follow-up visit #1 for patient SA-P004.

VS: 111/90 | HR 73 | Wt 69.0 kg. Patient slightly pale but hemodynamically stable.

Blood work results:
  - PSA: 0.71 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0]
  - ALT: 19.41 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 28.15 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 13.01 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5]
  - WBC: 6.81 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 1.04 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Plan: Supportive care as needed. Return for cycle 2 in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 2 | Date: 2025-07-05 ---

Patient SA-P004 presents for scheduled cycle 2 visit.

On exam, BP is 126/73, pulse 85, wt 81.3 kg. Patient appears well-nourished and in no acute distress.

No new adverse events reported since last visit.

Laboratory results:
  - PSA: 0.54 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0]
  - ALT: 20.75 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 25.38 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 12.52 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5]
  - WBC: 6.08 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 1.1 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Imaging assessment: Target lesion has increased by approximately 34.7% from nadir. Progressive disease (PD) per RECIST 1.1.

Serum PSA: 4.77 ng/mL, representing a increase of 34.7% compared to baseline.

Plan: Monitor closely and reassess at next visit. Return for cycle 3 in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 3 | Date: 2025-07-26 ---

Visit 3 clinical encounter for SA-P004.

On exam, BP is 142/77, pulse 83, wt 56.0 kg. Patient appears well-appearing, cooperative with exam.

No new adverse events reported since last visit.

Laboratory results:
  - PSA: 0.01 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0]
  - ALT: 20.36 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 29.03 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 12.25 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5]
  - WBC: 5.89 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 1.07 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Continue study protocol. Monitor labs. Return visit 4 scheduled in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 4 | Date: 2025-08-16 ---

SA-P004 — Cycle 4, Day 1 visit.

VS: 122/73 | HR 73 | Wt 82.5 kg. Patient comfortable, no distress noted.

No new adverse events reported since last visit.

Labs drawn today:
  - PSA: 0.01 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0]
  - ALT: 23.76 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 28.0 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 12.49 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5]
  - WBC: 5.99 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 1.1 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Restaging CT shows stable disease. Target lesions within +/-15% of prior measurements. No new lesions. RECIST: SD.

PSA now 3.9 ng/mL — increase 10.2% from initial value.

Continue study protocol. Monitor labs. Return visit 5 scheduled in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 5 | Date: 2025-09-06 ---

Visit 5 clinical encounter for SA-P004.

On exam, BP is 119/92, pulse 66, wt 57.1 kg. Patient appears mildly fatigued but alert and oriented.

Neuropathic symptoms noted: mild (Grade 1). Patient describes onset around day 99. Currently ongoing. No dose modification required.

Labs drawn today:
  - PSA: 0.01 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0]
  - ALT: 25.84 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 29.55 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 11.64 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5] (LOW)
  - WBC: 5.51 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 1.08 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Plan: Continue therapy per protocol with supportive medications. Return for cycle 6 in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 6 | Date: 2025-09-27 ---

Visit 6 clinical encounter for SA-P004.

Vital signs obtained: blood pressure 160/86, heart rate 73, weight 93.8 kg.

Lab panel results from today's draw:
  - PSA: 0.01 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0]
  - ALT: 22.76 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 29.63 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 12.01 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5]
  - WBC: 5.18 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 1.17 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Imaging reveals meaningful tumor shrinkage consistent with partial response (PR). Target lesion regression of ~46.0%.

PSA now 1.91 ng/mL — decrease 46.0% from initial value.

Continue study protocol. Monitor labs. Return visit 7 scheduled in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 7 | Date: 2025-10-18 ---

Patient SA-P004 presents for scheduled cycle 7 visit.

Vital signs obtained: blood pressure 150/85, heart rate 64, weight 95.4 kg.

Blood work results:
  - PSA: 0.01 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0]
  - ALT: 27.08 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 28.17 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 11.56 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5] (LOW)
  - WBC: 5.68 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 1.13 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Plan: Continue current regimen. Follow up in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 8 | Date: 2025-11-08 ---

No-show for cycle 8 visit. Staff attempted follow-up: patient's family member confirmed patient was unwell.

Investigator decision to discontinue patient from study in best interest of patient care.
